markdownRemark.html: Set in a beautiful building with lots of interesting pieces of art and archaeology. This museum is a must-visit in Málaga. It takes you back through 2,000+ years of local history. The museum is well-displayed with detailed information panels in Spanish and English.

frontmatter.title: Museo de Málaga
frontmatter.description: Museo de Málaga - Set in a beautiful building with lots of interesting pieces of art and archaeology. This museum is a must-visit in Málaga. It takes you back through 2,000+ years of local history. The museum is well-displayed with detailed information panels in Spanish and English..
frontmatter.price: Free for EU citizens. 1.50 euro for other countries.
